meaningMnemonic: A <radical>triceratops</radical> with a <radical>mustache</radical> will go on talking forever. Every time you think he's done he says, "<kanji>Furthermore</kanji>..." and keeps going. Something about a mustache on a dinosaur makes him kind of a jerk, but he's held in such high <kanji>esteem</kanji> that no one ever interrupts him.
readingMnemonic: Why don't you just interrupt this mustache triceratops while he's saying <kanji>furthermore</kanji>? Because he's the <reading>Shou</reading>gun's (しょう) pet. If you interrupt him you'll probably be put to death or something. Just let him keep going and hope he runs out of furthermores to talk about.
